publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5125 Robin Harper: School Design and A+DS—That the Parliament welcomes the creation of Architecture and Design Scotland’s (A+DS) unique web application, Smarter Places; further welcomes that the website, www.smarterplaces.org, empowers pupils, parents, teachers and wider communities to explore ideas about the type of school that they would like to see by creating virtual scrapbooks of interesting elements of schools from across Scotland; notes the benefits to school design that can be achieved when positive consultation with school users is undertaken, and expresses the hope that all local authorities will enthusiastically adopt the approaches set out in Smarter Places.
